price: 15. Ma sixir baa (cadaabkani), mise wax ma aragtaan?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
